user.description: Select your ISP from the list and enter credentials that you use to access corresponding control panel. All contracts tied to your user will be loaded.
user.title: ISP Login

errors.invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials provided. Please, check your input and try again.

abort.already_exists: Entry with the same ISP identifier and user already exists!
abort.isp_not_supported: ISP identifier `%s` does not match any supported ISP.
abort.invalid_server_response:
Invalid server response. Please, check your internet connection.
Should this operation fail multiple times, consider raising an issue on component's GitHub Issues page.
abort.unknown_error: Unknown error occurred. Please, check log for details.
